label.value: ELISPOT assay measuring epitope specific chemokine (C-C motif) ligand 1 production by T cells

definition.value: An enzyme-linked immunospot assay that detects chemokine (C-C motif) ligand 1 production by T cells.

label.value: ELISPOT assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-17F production by T cells

definition.value: An enzyme-linked immunospot assay that detects interleukin-17F production by T cells.

definition.value: An enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay that detects interleukin-17F production by T cells.

label.value: detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-17F production by T cells

definition.value: A detection of specific nucleic acid polymers with complementary probes that detects interleukin-17F production by T cells.

label.value: ELISPOT assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-17A production by T cells

definition.value: An enzyme-linked immunospot assay that detects interleukin-17A production by T cells.

label.value: cytometric bead array assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-18 production by T cells

definition.value: A cytometric bead array assay that detects interleukin-18 production by T cells.

label.value: detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-16 production by T cells

definition.value: A detection of specific nucleic acid polymers with complementary probes that detects interleukin-16 production by T cells.

label.value: ELISA measuring epitope specific interleukin-16 production by T cells

definition.value: An enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay that detects interleukin-16 production by T cells.

label.value: ELISPOT assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-16 production by T cells

definition.value: An enzyme-linked immunospot assay that detects interleukin-16 production by T cells.

label.value: intracellular cytokine staining assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-16 production by T cells

definition.value: A flow cytometry assay that detects interleukin-16 production by T cells.

label.value: detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-17A production by T cells

definition.value: A detection of specific nucleic acid polymers with complementary probes that detects interleukin-17A production by T cells.

label.value: intracellular cytokine staining assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-1 beta production by T cells

definition.value: A flow cytometry assay that detects interleukin-1 beta production by T cells.

label.value: ELISPOT assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-1 beta production by T cells

definition.value: An enzyme-linked immunospot assay that detects interleukin-1 beta production by T cells.

label.value: detection of specific nucleic acids with complementary probes measuring epitope specific interleukin-15 production by T cells

definition.value: A detection of specific nucleic acid polymers with complementary probes that detects interleukin-15 production by T cells.

label.value: ELISPOT assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-12 production by T cells

definition.value: An enzyme-linked immunospot assay that detects interleukin-12 production by T cells.

label.value: intracellular cytokine staining assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-15 production by T cells

definition.value: A flow cytometry assay that detects interleukin-15 production by T cells.

label.value: ELISPOT assay measuring epitope specific interleukin-15 production by T cells

definition.value: An enzyme-linked immunospot assay that detects interleukin-15 production by T cells.

label.value: chromatin interaction analysis by paired-end tag sequencing assay

definition.value: An assay that incorporates chromatin immunoprecipitation (ChIP)-based enrichment, chromatin proximity ligation, Paired-End Tags, and high-throughput sequencing to determine de novo long-range chromatin interactions genome-wide.

label.value: structural analysis by paired-end tag sequencing assay

definition.value: An assay that incorporates Paired-End Tags and sequencing technology to determine structural variants.

label.value: transcript analysis by paired-end tag sequencing assay

definition.value: A transcription profiling assay that determines transcripts, gene structures, and gene expressions using Paired-End Tags and sequencing technology.

label.value: DNase I hypersensitive sites sequencing assay

definition.value: An assay that identifies the location of regulatory regions, based on the genome-wide sequencing of regions super sensitive to cleavage by DNase I.

label.value: RNP (ribonuclear particle) immunoprecipitation high- throughput sequencing assay

definition.value: An analyte assay that combines immunoprecipitation of an RNA-binding protein and RNA-seq to identify mRNAs associated with selected RNA binding proteins (RBPs).

label.value: cross-linking immunoprecipitation high-throughput sequencing assay

definition.value: An analyte assay that employs UV-crosslinking between RNA and a protein, followed by immunoprecipitation with antibodies for the protein, fragmentation, and high-throughput screening for RNA sequences that interact with a particular RNA-binding protein.

label.value: formaldehyde-assisted isolation of regulatory elements assay

definition.value: An assay to determine the sequences of those DNA regions in the genome associated with regulatory activity.

label.value: methylation-sensitive restriction enzyme sequencing assay

definition.value: An assay that identifies unmethylated CpGs using methylation sensitive restriction enzymes to fragment DNA.

label.value: reduced representation bisulfite sequencing assay

definition.value: A bisulfite sequencing assay that identifies genomic methylation patterns using a bisulfite based protocol that enriches CG-rich parts of the genome.

label.value: shotgun bisulfite-seq assay

definition.value: A bisulfite sequencing assay that identifies methylated cytosines across the genome using high throughput sequencing.

label.value: RNA Annotation and Mapping of Promoters for the Analysis of Gene Expression assay

definition.value: An transcription profiling assay that identifies transcription start sites (TSS), the quantification of their expression and the characterization of their transcripts using high throughput sequencing.

label.value: DNA replication timing by array assay

definition.value: An assay which quantifies the timing of DNA replication as a function of genome position using array technology.

label.value: RNA-binding protein immunoprecipitation array profiling assay

definition.value: An assay that combines immunoprecipitation of an RNA-binding protein and array technology to identify mRNAs associated with selected RNA binding proteins (RBPs).

label.value: Carbon-copy chromosome conformation capture assay

definition.value: An assay that measures the organization of chromosomes at the genome-wide scale.

label.value: DNA replication timing by sequencing assay

definition.value: An assay in which timing of DNA replication is quantified as a function of genome position based on genome-wide sequencing.

label.value: RNA-binding protein immunoprecipitation tiling array profiling assay

definition.value: An RNA-binding protein immunoprecipitation array profiling assay that combines immunoprecipitation of an RNA-binding protein and RNA tiling array to identify mRNAs associated with selected RNA binding proteins (RBPs).

label.value: microRNA profiling by high throughput sequencing assay

definition.value: A microRNA profiling assay that analyzes the microRNA component of the transcriptome using high throughput sequencing technology.

label.value: protein sequencing by tandem mass spectrometry assay

definition.value: A sequencing assay that detremines amino acid sequences of proteins using multiple rounds of mass spectrometry and molecule fragmentation.

label.value: micrococcal nuclease digestion followed by high throughput sequencing assay

definition.value: An assay that identifies nucleosome positioning by genome wide sequencing of regions sensitive to digestion by micrococal nuclease

label.value: chromatin immunoprecipitation with exonuclease sequencing assay

definition.value: A ChIP-seq assay which uses immunoprecipitation to isolate protein bound DNA followed by an exonuclease step to degrade DNA that is not protein bound to provide greater resolution of the DNA binding site

label.value: microRNA profiling assay

definition.value: A transcription profiling assay that quantifies the microRNA species within a biological sample.

label.value: ChIP assay

definition.value: An assay in which portions of chromatin, the ordered and organized complex of DNA and its interaction partners that make up a chormosome, is extracted and purified by immunoprecipitation with antibodies or tags, and subsequently analyzed

label.value: assay using chromatin immunoprecipitation

definition.value: An assay that produces data about protein-DNA interaction or DNA epigenetic modification using immunoprecipitation

label.value: taxonomic diversity assessment by targeted gene survey

definition.value: An assay that dteremines taxonomic and community diversity information by sequencing specific genomic regions used as marker of identity or diversity.

label.value: hydrogen/deuterium exchange footprinting assay

definition.value: A footprinting assay that uses a chemical reaction whereby a covalently bonded hydrogen atom is replaced by a deuterium atom, or vice versa in order to gather information about the solvent accessibility of parts of a molecule and thus its tertiary structure.

label.value: cytometry assay

definition.value: An assay that counts and/or measures characteristics of cells.

label.value: immunoblot assay

definition.value: An analyte assay that detects specific molecules in an input material by separating it using gel electrophoresis, transfering the separated molecules to a membrane, and staining them with_ antibodies specific to the analyte molecules.

label.value: fluorescence quenching binding assay

definition.value: A binding assay in which the proximity of two entities is monitored by measuring a fluorescent signal of one of the entities that gets reduced if the two entities are cliose to each other.

label.value: in vivo intervention experiment

definition.value: An assay in which the effect of a targeted process (the intervention) on an organism is tested.

label.value: disease exacerbation in vivo intervention experiment

definition.value: An in vivo intervention experiment that tests the ability of the intervention to increase the severity of a disease in the host.

label.value: protection from challenge in vivo intervention experiment

definition.value: An in vivo intervention experiment that tests the ability of the intervention to prevent occurrence of a disease in a host.

label.value: tolerance induction intervention experiment

definition.value: An in vivo intervention experiment that tests the ability of the intervention to decrease an immune response.

label.value: treatment intervention experiment

definition.value: An in vivo intervention experiment in which the ability of the intervention to reduce or cure the effects of a disease are tested.
